content: and increases at the neck edge row 1 rs k1 m1l work in patt to the end of row row 2 ws sl2pwyif work as sts present work these 2 row a total of 6-7-7-7 times there are now 25-26-28-28 sts on the needles break yarn and put all sts on hold to waste yarn while you work the right shoulder right shoulder pick up and knit 22-22-24-24 sts 12 sts over right rib band edge & 10-10-12-12 sts over st sts with the 4 5 mm needles rs facing you pick up sts from the right edge to the neckline edge of the back cast on edge with the main working yarn next to work at the ws and continue working right rib band edge in pattern 3 tricodo © copyright 2025 for sizes s & m only row 1 ws bind off 1 stitch at neck edge p3 turn row 2 rs ds knit to end row 3 ws bind off 1 stitch p6 turn row 4 rs ds knit to end row 5 ws bind off 1 stitch p6 k1 p2 turn there are here 19-19 sts on the needles row 6 rs ds work as sts present and working only short row row 1 ws p7 k1 p2 2 times k1 turn row 2 rs ds work as sts present row 3 ws p7 k1 p2 3 times k1 p1 turn row 4 rs ds work as sts present for sizes l & xl only row 1 ws bind off 1 stitch at neck edge p3 turn row 2 rs ds knit to end row 3 ws bind off 1 stitch p6 turn row 4 rs ds knit to end row 5 ws bind off 1 stitch p8 k1 turn there are here 21-21 sts on your needles row 6 rs ds work as sts present and working only short row row 1 ws p9 k1 p2 k1 p1 turn row 2 rs ds work as sts present row 3 ws p9 k1 p2 2 times k1 p1 turn row 4 rs ds work as sts present row 5 ws p9 k1 p2 3 times k1 turn row 6 rs ds work as sts present all sizes work 25 row back and forth in stockinette stitch and continue working right rib band edge in patt next work to shape the front neckline at next rs row as follows with back and forth row in stockinette stitch right rib band edge in pattern at the right edge and increases at the neck edge row 1 rs work as sts present to the last stitch on the needle m1r k1 row 2 ws work as sts present to last 2 sts sl2pwyif work these 2 row a total of 6-7-7-7 times there are here 25-26-28-28 sts on the needles do not break yarn front next rs row work both front parts together as follows work the 25-26-28-28 sts of the right shoulder as sts present cast on 10-12-12-12
